LanguageData.ResearchAutoEnemySwitch.label: Automatic Enemy Switch
LanguageData.ResearchAutoEnemySwitch.description: Research an enemy detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching when an enemy is found.
LanguageData.ResearchAutoEnemySwitch.descriptionDisco: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch when an enemy is detected.
LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.label: Automatic Power Switch
LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.description: Research a motion detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching.
LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.descriptionDisco: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch on when someone is in the room. Additionally further enhancement is now possible.
LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.label: Timer Switch
LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.description: Research a timer for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching at specific times.
LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.descriptionDiscovere: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch at specified times.
